item.title: 大马士革教堂的自杀炸弹至少杀死20次 - 《纽约时报》
item.description: 大马士革教堂的自杀炸弹至少杀死20 ＆nbsp; nbsp; 纽约时报href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiwkfvx3lxte9jzfr3rxhhded0cfj2zxjxjxazgxgxtwpp QW5WOEJ1RWZFDENVVHPSCI1YVW43CGH5MTEYSLNITLFTOVVLVDBZNTJUQJI0ZLVYDLZCUK9OQW4YBNYWQQ？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>大马士革教堂的自杀炸弹杀死20，当局说＆nbsp;＆nbsp; bbc 叙利亚教堂的自杀炸弹袭击者至少杀死20 ＆nbsp; nbsp; CBS News 至少有20名在大马士革教堂轰炸袭击中丧生，数十人受伤＆nbsp; nbsp; al Jazeera 大马士革教堂的伊斯兰国家自杀炸弹炸弹造成了许多死亡，数十人受伤＆nbsp; nbsp; 守护者

item.title: 白俄罗斯反对派领导人的丈夫敦促特朗普帮助释放其他囚犯-BBC

item.title: 当以色列恢复了另外三个人质的尸体时，加沙仍有多少人？ - 美国国家公共电台

item.title: 据报道，伊朗议会撤回了可能飙升的Hormuz海峡 - Axios
item.description: 伊朗议会撤回了Hormuz的关闭海峡，这可能会飙升石油价格＆nbsp; nbsp; axios 以色列 - 伊朗战争现场：伊朗议会投票通过回应美国的攻击，以关闭Hormuz海峡，这引起了对石油价格冲击的担忧＆nbsp; hormuz闭合海峡如何影响美国人？＆nbsp; nbsp; newsweek href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmipgfbvv95cuxnoxlacglyrgx5y0lznl9vqjjjjjjjjjjjjvyxc0rdywzlewzlewzlewnxcznjnjnjnjnjn1ue1lvmpyuvj4sflgppzppzdgpzdggpzdggpzdggpzdgg1n RHZxcVVlZ1lybVJDWkJodl9iTlMwTWpGbmpwSnZIbDlNUlBLRExMbFYxb0dibDYzYzlfYXI0c3ZZdUdDSU53enZfSzNnWGthX0Y4cXBCVHMwRVFRODByUk1jNEw0cXJS d29nbWpRTDI2U1l30gGrAUFVX3lxTE1RNk5hRXUxMHdYdUhSaUtrdEhJZ1poa3FqRTZSOGdQcjIzZTJXejBnYUNXLXhRSkFHMGluZU5OamRfeWo0RkVqbDJCY2wzYjFF Q2UyTEcxVmJwakFVTC1DdXZpbVdib1J5ZlAyOVRhT0FLYS1kZEYtMExrMElWY3E1SHhicXQzRFAtNzZ5MFdsaEdockQ2LTI1MW9ueHpnRjR0LVRUdE1pZDVkWQ?oc=5" target =“ _ blank”>实时更新：美国官员说伊朗核场地遭受了'严重损害'＆nbsp; 山丘href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmihwfbvv95cuxqquvpegpegpegpegpegpegpegpegpexl3zg1atdnuzfbsnec0vlzlzlzlzlzlstr4uei3shru RS1HODBBMJOQ0VRAVZRBHOTOGFQSHFUUGTZY3LETLLSBFBFBFBFBFBFBFRNVNNPBVPGZL9PEK5ISU9WB3ZRRJRRJRKRKRKRKRKRKRKRKRKRKRKRKRKRKRKRKRKRKRBMRBMRBMNBUNG9IANBNBUNG9IANNRSLSLSLPPQVTL RS1HPTXZBAMKZBTDSAYWBQVVFFMT1F2RNZPVDQDQWEUHQV2FLNTL4TWNWEHRIUED5S2JSUY0YBWPQOHRWUEX5WXFJT1ROT01ROT01ROT01CMVNOMWEMWZNEM R0MWVYRNPPZGRPETZVDTBSBG0YZ0HJWEJRC3BZANZRVNRTEXRZSUH6TXPRZFZFZTMJVC1BBA3DPWDNKQ1J6NKQ1J6NAWNFQUFQUQSSSSSVZRBNNNNNSKU？ target =“ _ blank”> Hormuz海峡很容易受到伊朗的报复。这是有关重要石油贸易路线的知识。＆nbsp;＆nbsp; CBS News

item.title: 伊朗的最高领导人面临着他的决定性时刻 - 财务时期

item.title: 巴西：八人丧生，13人在热气球撞车中受伤-DW
item.description: 巴西：八人丧生，13人在热气球崩溃中受伤＆nbsp; nbsp; dw 热气球事件在巴西杀死八人href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiiafbvv95cuxpn2tddddoxbpczrxntljzzljzzlnszbucmkmkwswq4teh5ahdxull4djjjts 1UTCVBWRLHMLW5HZWTLU0JKMUC5ZXL4RFLQYVZ6CKPUNDNVTFPAU2DPLWHTQ1NGDEZNMW5VAMJICLPYEXYZZXL2SGPNUFFNUFFNUFFNUFFREDJTBUHHHHM19VT JR6OEHED3WAWYLLU0GGOAUFVX3LXTE85M0JCMLZXDHLTSM5WZET3R1FRLUW3LVR4EMTFRK90AJFTWWHWWHWBNJGA1MTRDG1MTRDG5SKZFV3PVTNPVTNPVTNBBYNUTNETSU 1Jnbudesnduew5qunnut3gzew1hmg1quefznzznzzrahhhhmnu2qkzxsg1xbtn2uwttdgvtevtevbzrdbpalmwnkdzdm4s3v3y2hkewktv0e？oc = 5 target =“ _ blank”>在巴西南部热气球事故后至少8人死亡＆nbsp; nbsp; cnn 热气球在巴西坠毁，至少杀死8人＆nbsp; nbsp; 纽约时报 火热的热气球悲剧至少杀死8人：'我们在哀悼中'

item.title: 部长说，英国在美国对伊朗的罢工之前通知，没有寻求帮助。
item.description: 英国在美国对伊朗的罢工之前已通知，没有帮助的要求，部长说＆nbsp; nbsp; REUTERS pm警告美国炸弹伊朗核网站之后的'升级风险' href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiwgfbvvv95cuxqbnr6dwxyt09snfnus0j zdvbeefjnzznsse00nkx4v0r4z2joszv2uuvyvnfirfvowmxmr2z3ns1wcgfdqtn5vkzsb2lyutjyow kyckixrdvwwdnpctz3zzfnexptuhzmui1goe8xq0tvq2p5bzlazll6rvbrszz1d1fds1bfwmhrdetln lctrtg5tthxtkToyu9sm2xinm80ng9vwfryb0xotvzkcwpgq1cwpgq1cweg5kdldeqwjeclm2bdnydw？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>我们向英国向伊朗的请求将提出法律问题，ex-adviser说＆nbsp; nbsp; 守护者 href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiugFBVV95cUxQRm9rTXZlekY2QXRFXzBVTHBjdV90YzZmQmZ4a3RoYzNFRERsNG9NR2dsSW9ORkdYbFRJZUttVXE4X3d2azNPOGFGLVQ0V 2NTczFOMWpkZGhNYWVWRlRTd0tWcjY3azl3RndCQjFOQWRvRW5OQUJjeFBUX2Rzcy1aV2t1SEhya tywuhb3x1phn0phu2hqdnvyr0hsttfirefzegdpv0nwmzlhc25icgn1bdl0tgxbd1rmmwc？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”> starmer：英国将军事设备移至中东以保护其利益＆nbsp; nbsp; 以色列时代 <a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMipgFBVV95cUxPcXFnUzNjSHhpVjdDdGUyNTZ5M1R0aDhBZzc1RXhMUUJEMTR0b05lZTNCYUVaLUN5ajdaOEdmbVJXbHF Ab2xnrmd3uheyxgwekravmfodernzjnhdtvimk9vqtj6rmjbc1h0cxlyefjes1vfblhjrwzzvi1uwzzvi1uwlwlzodhmruhmruhmruhwchjjvctbsnmrlz3vjqz3vjqz3vjqz3vjqzz3vjqzz3vjquzzlnlc3 tddddddddpdfudful'oi occ3 tdpful'''''''''''''' target =“ _ blank”>特朗普刚刚展示了英国和欧盟在全球舞台上的无用，＆nbsp; nbsp; 电报

item.title: 核恐惧成为伊朗政权变化的呼吁 - 滚石
item.description: 核恐惧成为伊朗政权变化的呼吁＆nbsp;＆nbsp; 滚石href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmirafbvv95cuxod0ztafd6snbxwdzzr1rpavbbbbbbbbbulvbulvjblrdbehnuev4nmv4nmv4nmrdbehuev4nmrdbehuev4nmrdbev4nmrqufq5amrquq5mrquq5lqu2lqu2lmqu2lmqu23nlyzfhzfhzv3nlyzbsbsb6sbsbsbsb6666666.mrqumzbnlyzb.6mmrqumzbnlyzb NMDZBT2NOEM5RYVFONE5RX3VCEVO3S1J3UE83Z2X1YJJLTXR5YMPWA0M2U19RVFFHHT0T1QV B4EDLTSM1KVZH1RGXVX1V4CXCXZWVQMNVNCULTN3JWRVLIDWTKAEHZC1ZXAWLDZXZU？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>以色列测试理论，即独自空中力量无法赢得战争＆nbsp; nbsp; wsj 伊朗的真正威胁：德黑兰回应以色列的最危险选择 href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiqgFBVV95cUxNLVhQdTU1b1p3RlZzc3pQbXF4U1kyNHR4SmdKSzJpOVJMU3Z3X0hJRWdXVTFQNnpVcHFGNXh ad1A5c2FhNFB0MVZYeU1qWWx2cEt4Q19fT0MyT3Roa000YktHaGZvS2RFR3RUWmNscUxQZGRPdFVFb0t4Y0JfdXpQcFVFYzMzLTllRUJUV0xpZGdpODVxVG9KNnZmRFgwU 05HEHL4N0DKUGRAD9IBRWFBVV95CUXQVMPNSUJJZFY0VLYXVLYXVJHXT0T2V0ZKDKDKDKDKDKDKSRTVUOEEFYYTDDD0D0D0D0D0D0D0D0D0D0DDD0DD0DDDDD0DDD0DDD0DDD0DDD0DDD0DDD0DDD0DDD0DDD0D0DDD0D0 3N2J5Z0LSRK9GLTZGZI03NGLRSHNSBERWUGEZDUFUMVRHR1FAQJE5MHDGWTGTM1MLVNMMFFLZEHIMFLZEHIMFLZEHIT2DNN1FKX3ZDCMJRENRENVCMJRENRENVCMJRENVIMEFEAFEAFEA1U5N1U5N1HTZ3Z3ZJGNZQVZJPNMWMWMNETNMET target =“ _ blank”>如果与以色列与以色列的战争导致政权的跌倒＆nbsp; nbsp; 特朗普对伊朗水泥的罢工内塔尼亚胡的政治复出＆nbsp; nbsp; nbsp; 纽约时报
